hardState.name: Aurora Berg
hardState.description: A towering, many-tiered iceberg whose shelves host rival super-penguin colonies.

hardState.name: Aurora Stack
hardState.description: A vertical colony carved into the sunlit face of Aurora Berg, known for orderly terraces and bright trade banners.

hardState.name: Nightfall Shelf
hardState.description: A shadowed ledge on the far side of Aurora Berg, lit by bioluminescent ice glyphs and whispered deals.

hardState.name: Krill Shoals
hardState.description: Dense drifting clouds of krill that pass regularly beneath Aurora Stack, the lifeblood of its fisheries.

hardState.name: The Glow-Fissure
hardState.description: A deep crack in the ice under Nightfall Shelf that pulses with otherworldly light and warps the currents.

hardState.name: Windward Ridge
hardState.description: A knife-edge crest of ice where the high winds carve strange patterns and carry news between colonies.

hardState.name: The Icebound Exchange
hardState.description: A merchant guild that monopolizes trade through Aurora Stack, issuing carved-ice credit chits and regulating fish prices.

cultures.name: World
cultures.description: Transcendent entities that belong to the world itself - eras, major occurrences, and world-spanning events.

cultures.name: Aurora Stack
cultures.description: The orderly, trade-focused culture of Aurora Stack colony. Values commerce, organization, and technological progress.

cultures.name: Nightfall Shelf
cultures.description: The secretive, mystical culture of Nightfall Shelf colony. Values cunning, magic, and shadow dealings.

cultures.name: Orca Raiders
cultures.description: The fierce warrior culture of the orca raiders. Values strength, conquest, and dominance.

regions.label: Aurora Berg
regions.description: A towering, many-tiered iceberg whose shelves host rival super-penguin colonies.

regions.label: Aurora Stack
regions.description: A vertical colony carved into the sunlit face of Aurora Berg, known for orderly terraces and bright trade banners.

regions.label: Nightfall Shelf
regions.description: A shadowed ledge on the far side of Aurora Berg, lit by bioluminescent ice glyphs and whispered deals.

regions.label: Windward Ridge
regions.description: A knife-edge crest of ice where the high winds carve strange patterns and carry news between colonies.

regions.label: Krill Shoals
regions.description: Dense drifting clouds of krill that pass regularly beneath Aurora Stack, the lifeblood of its fisheries.

regions.label: The Glow-Fissure
regions.description: A deep crack in the ice under Nightfall Shelf that pulses with otherworldly light and warps the currents.
